tool_description: Generate QR codes dynamically for a wide range of applications. With this API, you can easily integrate QR code generation capabilities into your applications, websites, or services, enabling you to provide users with quick access to information, links, or interactive experiences.
name: Easy QR Code Generator API
title: Easy QR Code Generator API

api_list.name: Generate SMS QR Code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://easy-qr-code-generator-api1.p.rapidapi.com/sms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "easy-qr-code-generator-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
